lzh_grouping_info: 受使行如比丘中廣說。是故世尊說。
en_grouping_info: Explanation of the 19 saṅghādisesa rules, part 1.

en: “Accepting to act as a messenger” is as explained in detail in the bhikkhu rules. This is what the World-honored One said.

lzh: 若比丘尼受使行。和合男女若取婦若私通。乃至須臾頃。是法初罪僧伽婆尸沙。
en: If a bhikkhunī accepts to act as a messenger to unite a man and a woman, whether for a marriage or an affair, even for just one moment, it’s an immediate sanghadisesa offense.
